creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
It is not hard at all to get jsps that generate .java and .class files that 
are longer than the maximum path length for Windows (which isn't very long)

eg.

_0002fPortal_00033_00030_00032_0002fpane_0002fagents_0002fagents_0005fuseredit_0002ejspagents_0005fuseredit.class

is pretty long and I've had to install tomcat in a directory called j to be safe

(The Exception thrown is 'can't write')

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
This has been improved in Tomcat 3.3 and is solved in Tomcat 4.0.  It won't be 
addressed in the Tomcat 3.2.x branch.
